description:
THE #1 COURSE ON COPYWRITING

  • Do you wanna learn how to make a living by writing simple sales pages for companies, all from the comfort of your home?
  • Do you love writing and but need the right training to make your writing profitable?
  • Do you want to work from home, decide your own hours and earn up to $125.000 a year?
  • Did you know that copywriting is a booming industry and companies from all over the world are constantly seeking copywriters to write sales copy for their web or -print commercials, sales letters, sales pages and web banners?


THE 10 STEP COPYWRITER SYSTEM is a simple training program that will teach you all you need to become a professional copywriter from scratch. Say "Goodbye" to frustrating dreams about being your own boss and "Hello" to your new career as a respected copywriter.


IN THIS COURSE YOU WILL LEARN:

  • A researched & proven 10 step system for writing optimized sales copy for any format (sales letter, banner, sales pages, ad copy etc.) 
  • What copywriting is and why it's a great career opportunity
  • How to structure the elements of a sales page or commercial to get the best results
  • How to get your first paid freelance copywriting work in 7 days
  • How to build a $1000/m part time side income
  • How to build a full time copywriting business or use your skills to get a normal 9-5 job at a advertisement agency. 
  • How to turn your copywriting skills into $1000/m passive income (Bonus lecture)


HERE'S WHY MY STUDENTS ARE EXITED!

"I've always loved to write, but never knew how to write commercials and stuff like that. This course really showed me how to write a proper commercial. What to say, how to frame it and all that. The "formula" system is really quite simple and I found it quite easy to just take a look at the lessons when writing a sales letter and I would know just what to write and how to word it. I can definitely recommend the course!" 
- David Rasmussen


GUARANTEE

If within 30 days of using the Lumpy Mail method you haven’t seen the results you expected (or for any other reason) please, get a Udemy-backed refund and spend the money elsewhere. I only want satisfied customers.


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Who are you? My name is Ivan Westen. I have 10 years of experience running a business owner. I run several ecommerce businesses in Europe and I sell web design to businesses in a variety of sectors. Copywriting has been a central part of my business and in my 10 years of doing business, I have continually worked on improving my skills as a copywriter and i have used these skills to sell a lot of products on my own sites as helped clients with their sales copy.

What's in it for you? I get paid for teaching you step-by-step how to write sales copy and become a professional copywriter part- or full time. I use the money you pay me to buy coffee and diapers for my daughter + I love seeing my students succeed. 

I'm have no experience as a writer - Will this course work for me? Yes it will. The 10 Step Copywriter System is made for beginners that know nothing about copywriting. The system teaches you to write optimized copywriting by breaking copy writing principles down to simple mathematical formulas that can be learned and applied by anyone. I have focused on making it as simple to grasp as possible, and my experience is that most students learn it pretty quickly, even with no experience. 

How much can I expect to earn? It depends. A beginning copywriter will usually make $30-$50 an hour and an experienced will make $100 an hour. Then it's just up to you to decide how many hours you want to work (since there is an endless supply of companies that needs freelance copywriters - I show you were to find them in the course). A yearly salary of $100.000 is not uncommon for many freelance copywriters. 

Can you guarantee the 10 Step Copywriter System will work for me? To become a professional copywriter you have got to WANT it to happen. It takes effort to build a job replacing income. But, if your just out to get a $500 side income, this can be done very fast. But, as with all things, it takes effort. So, naturally, I can't guarantee that you will have succes, but If you make an effort their is a high probability that you will. 

And if for some reason you do not like your results – just get a refund.

Does it work in other languages than English? It sure does. I'm from Europe and I primarily use the system in my native language Danish. The principles and formulas for writing sales copy are universal and can be used in any language. 


ARE YOU READY TO BECOME A PAID COPYWRITER 7 DAYS FROM NOW?

Please press the "Take This Course" button on top to start your new career!
title: Copywriting - Become a Freelance Copywriter In 7 Days
